alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Franklin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 04 at 3:48AM EST until March 04 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers... Whitewater River at Brookville. ...The Flood Advisory is cancelled for the following rivers... Olentangy River near Worthington. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Whitewater River at Brookville. * WHEN...Until this morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Lowland flooding can be expected near Cedar Grove and New Trenton, with lowland flooding also occurring in West Harrison, Indiana and Harrison, Ohio. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 AM EST Saturday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below 10 feet by this afternoon. - Action stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
